title: inisai ezil kunjam
sahitya:
innisai ezhil konjum naTabhairavi

tannilai maRandE nenjam negizha naTampuriyum  

anupallavi  

viNNavarum muni pungavarum tozhum

pannaga bhUshanin pAdasilamboli pozhiyum  

caraNam  

kaNNanin kuzhalOsai tanda sunAdamE

aNDamellAm negizhum gAna vinOdamE

veNtAmarai talattil amarnda sarvANiyum

kaNNimai enakkAkkum kAmAkSi annai magizhum
